select m.*,
u.realName as u_realName, u.contact as u_contact, u.sex as u_sex,
h.name as house_name
from salesman_stat m left outer join user u on u.id = m.userId left outer join e_house h on h.id = m.houseId where m.userId = #{0} and m.houseId = #{1}

select m.*,
u.realName as u_realName, u.contact as u_contact, u.sex as u_sex,
h.name as house_name
from salesman_stat m left outer join user u on u.id = m.userId left outer join e_house h on h.id = m.houseId where 1=1
and m.userId = #{page.searchMap.userId}
and u.realName like "%"#{page.searchMap.realName}"%"
and u.contact like "%"#{page.searchMap.contact}"%"
order by m.${page.searchMap.order}
order by m.id desc
